psm3mkv 0.2.1.9002

Function reference

All functions

calc_allrmds()
Calculate restricted mean durations for each health state and all three models
calc_allrmds_boot()
Wrapper to enable bootstrap sampling of restricted mean durations for each health state and all three models.
calc_dens()
Calculate the value of the density function
calc_dens_par()
Calculate the value of the density function (parametric form)
calc_ex()
Calculate restricted life expectancy from a lifetable
calc_haz()
Calculate the value of the hazard function
calc_haz_par()
Calculate the value of the hazard function (parametric form)
calc_haz_psm()
Derive pre and post-progression hazards of death under PSM
calc_likes()
Calculate likelihoods for three three-state model structures
calc_likes_psm_complex()
Calculate likelihood for a more complex three-state partitioned survival model
calc_likes_psm_simple()
Calculate likelihood for a simple three-state partitioned survival model
calc_likes_stm_cf()
Calculate likelihood for a three-state clock forward state transition model
calc_likes_stm_cr()
Calculate likelihood for a three-state clock reset state transition model
calc_ltdens()
Calculate mortality density from a lifetable
calc_ltsurv()
Calculate survival from a lifetable
calc_pdist()
Calculate the distribution function
calc_pdist_par()
Calculate the distribution function for parametric functions
calc_rmd()
Calculate restricted mean durations
calc_rmd_first()
Calculate restricted mean duration in respect of the first part of a two-piece model Internal function to calculate the restricted mean duration up to the cut-off time, the first part of a two-piece model. Assumes the time horizon is beyond the cutoff time.
calc_rmd_par()
Calculate restricted mean durations (parametric form)
calc_surv()
Calculate the value of the survival function
calc_surv_psmpps()
Derive PPS survival function under a PSM
check_posdef()
Checks whether the Hessian for a survival regression is positive-definite
constrain_survprob()
Constrain survival probabilities according to hazards in a lifetable Recalculated constrained survival probabilities (by week) as the lower of the original unadjusted survival probability and the survival implied by the given lifetable (assumed indexed as years).
convert_fit2spec()
Obtain the type and specification as required in other package functions from a model fit
convert_wks2yrs()
Convert weeks to years
convert_yrs2wks()
Convert years to weeks
create_dummydata()
Create dummy dataset for illustration
create_dummydata_flexbosms()
Create flexbosms dataset for illustration
create_dummydata_survcan()
Create survcan dummy dataset for illustration
create_extrafields()
Create the additional time-to-event endpoints, adjusting for cutpoint
drmd_psm()
Discretized Restricted Mean Duration calculation for Partitioned Survival Model Calculate restricted mean duration (RMD) in PF, PD and OS states under a Partitioned Survival Model structure.
drmd_stm_cf()
Discretized Restricted Mean Duration calculation for State Transition Model Clock Forward structure Calculate restricted mean duration (RMD) in PF, PD and OS states under a State Transition Model Clock Forward structure.
drmd_stm_cr()
Discretized Restricted Mean Duration calculation for State Transition Model Clock Reset structure Calculate restricted mean duration (RMD) in PF, PD and OS states under a State Transition Model Clock Reset structure.
find_bestfit_par()
Find the "best" survival regression from a list
find_bestfit_spl()
Find the "best" survival regression from a list of spline model fits
fit_ends_mods_given()
Fit survival models to each endpoint, given type and spec Internal function to fit survival models to each endpoint, given type and spec in format of convert_fit2spec()
fit_ends_mods_par()
Fit multiple parametric survival regressions to the multiple required endpoints
fit_ends_mods_spl()
Fit multiple spline regressions to the multiple required endpoints
fit_mods()
Fit survival regressions with multiple splines or parametric distributions
fit_mods_par()
Fit survival regressions with multiple parametric distributions
fit_mods_spl()
Fit survival regressions with multiple spline regressions
give_noparams()
Number of parameters used by parametric statistical distributions
give_noparams_par()
Number of parameters used by parametric statistical distributions
graph_psm_hazards()
Graph the PSM hazard functions
graph_psm_survs()
Graph the PSM survival functions
graph_survs()
Graph the observed and fitted state membership probabilities
pickout_psmhaz()
Obtain adjusted and unadjusted PSM hazards
prmd_os_psm()
Safely calculate restricted mean duration for overall survival in the partitioned survival model
prmd_pd_stm_cf()
Safely calculate restricted mean duration in progressed disease state for clock forward state transition model
prmd_pd_stm_cr()
Safely calculate restricted mean duration in progressed disease state for clock reset state transition model
prmd_pf_psm()
Safely calculate restricted mean duration in progression free state for the partitioned survival model
prmd_pf_stm()
Safely calculate restricted mean duration in progression-free for state transition models
prob_os_psm()
Calculate probability of being alive in a partitioned survival model
prob_os_stm_cf()
Calculate probability of being alive under the state transition clock forward model
prob_os_stm_cr()
Calculate probability of being alive under the state transition clock reset model
prob_pd_psm()
Calculate membership probability of progressed disease state in a partitioned survival model
prob_pd_stm_cf()
Calculate probability of having progressed disease under the state transition clock forward model
prob_pd_stm_cr()
Calculate probability of having progressed disease under the state transition clock reset model
prob_pf_psm()
Calculate probability of being progression free in partitioned survival model
prob_pf_stm()
Calculate probability of being progression free in either state transition model (clock forward or clock reset)
prob_pps_cf()
Calculate probability of post progression survival under the state transition clock forward model
prob_pps_cr()
Calculate probability of post progression survival under the state transition clock reset model
rmd_os_psm()
Restricted mean duration for overall survival in the partitioned survival model
rmd_pd_stm_cf()
Restricted mean duration in progressed disease state for clock forward state transition model
rmd_pd_stm_cr()
Restricted mean duration in progressed disease state for clock reset state transition model
rmd_pf_psm()
Restricted mean duration in progression free state for the partitioned survival model
rmd_pf_stm()
Restricted mean duration in progression-free for state transition models
vlookup()
VLOOKUP function
vonelookup()
VoneLOOKUP function
